name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TapToCopee - Copy Text Button for ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a copy button for your chatGPT session to copy its response in a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TapToCopee for chatGPT is designed to enhance the user experience on chatgpt.com by showing a 'Copy' button . Users can then easily copy the text content they need with a single click. It operates exclusively on the example.com domain

TapToCopee for chatGPT  your friendly little helper to make copying text on chatgpt a breeze. Once installed, the extension adds a 'Copy' button to specific sections of text on 'chatgpt.com' webpages.

Here's how it makes your life easier:

ðŸ‘‰ Click the 'Copy' button and voila! The text in that section is now on your clipboard, ready to be pasted wherever you need it.

ðŸ’¼ Once copied, the button hides itself for a bit, showing a 'Copied' message so you know it's done its job. It'll pop back up in a couple of seconds, ready for the next copy.

Give it a try and save yourself some time and effort!
